unit_rules.name: Author of the Codex
unit_rules.text: At the start of the Battle Round, do one of the following.

unit_rules.name: Ultramarines Bodyguard
unit_rules.text: While within 3" of a friendly +Adeptus Astartes Infantry+ unit, this model has +Lone Operative+.

unit_rules.name: Armor of Fate
unit_rules.text: The first time this model is destroyed, roll d6. On a 3+, set this model back up on the battlefield as close to where it was as possible, not within Melee Distance, with 6 Health remaining.
